attributes.action: Ask Harriet Harman to try and form a government of national unity.
attributes.background:
Ask Harriet Harman to try & form a government of national unity in the event of a no confidence vote being lost by the government.

Harriet Harman is a quality politician.She is mother of the House and her wisdom and experience is respected by all. Give her the chance to lead us through this time.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/246772
